# Read in-app event information | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ Read in-app event information ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_)

-  Read in-app event information 

Web Service Endpoint# Read in-app event information

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEvents/{id}
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#query-parameters)

`fields[appEventLocalizations]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `locale, name, shortDescription, longDescription, appEvent, appEventScreenshots, appEventVideoClips``fields[appEvents]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `referenceName, badge, eventState, deepLink, purchaseRequirement, primaryLocale, priority, purpose, territorySchedules, archivedTerritorySchedules, localizations``include``[string]`

 Value: `localizations``limit[localizations]``integer`

 Maximum: `50`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_#Endpoints)

[`GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appevents-_id_-localizations)[`GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appevents-_id_-relationships-localizations)[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/appEvents`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents)[`PATCH /v1/appEvents/{id}`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appevents-_id_)[`POST /v1/appEvents`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appevents)[`Delete an App Event`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-appevents-_id_)Delete an in-app event and its related metadata.
